thread.title: Kate Mara Jamie Bell fuel dating rumours
thread.title_full: Kate Mara Jamie Bell fuel dating rumours

title: Kate Mara Jamie Bell fuel dating rumours
text:
Kate Mara, Jamie Bell fuel dating rumours 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Tuesday 1st September, 2015 
Actors Kate Mara and Jamie Bell continue to fuel dating rumours. 
The co-stars of "The Fantastic Four" were seen cuddling in a group photograph when they were on a Malibu beach on August 29. 
Their stylist friend Johnny Wujek took to Instagram on August 30 to share the image, reports aceshowbiz.com. 
It showed Mara wearing a white tank top and black shorts while Bell appeared shirtless wearing swimming trunks and necklace. 
Mara rested her head on Bell's bare chest. The two were all smiles while the 29-year-old actor placed one of his hands on Mara's head. 
"Celebrating the full moon in Malibu last night w/ this lot of Goof Balls," read the caption. 
The two have been often seen hanging out together in New York City as they promoted "The Fantastic Four", which released in August. More Technology Industry News
